name: Unstable Room
description:
Everything chage in unstable room! Enemies, enviroment and goals! Try to win, if you can.

Сontrol:

Move: WASD or Arrows

Shoot: Z or SPACE or LMB

Authors:

Vicheslav Zuravlev - developer

Andrey Elisafenko - artist / game-designer

Anna Bespalove - artist

Alexey Salamatin - game-designer

Outsourses resourses

Music and sounds from https://freesound.org/
